alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 9:52PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield County through 1015 PM MDT... At 951 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Glenwood Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenwood Springs and Glenwood Canyon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 106 and 128. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas
